cast.overview: Unlucky assassin Ladybug is determined to do his job peacefully after one too many gigs gone off the rails. Fate, however, may have other plans, as Ladybug's latest mission puts him on a collision course with lethal adversaries from around the globe—all with connected, yet conflicting, objectives—on the world's fastest train.
cast.title: Bullet Train

details.biography: From Jewish and Basque Origin. Samuel was born in Latin America and has been living in LA for the last 20 years. Graduated Meisner Complete Program, Stanislavsky training for 17 years, Fitzmaurice Voice Work, Chekhov Body Gesture Developments and RADA's Shakespeare Award Bronze and Silver program. Locally LA trained in several Studios and Personally Coached by key artists from UK.
details.name: Samuel Code
